```{r}

```

```{r scale-U5mr}
df_scaled <- df %>% mutate(
  scaled_nmr = log(nmr/(u5mr-nmr)),
    scaled_u5mr = log(u5mr)
  )
```

Run a lm

```{r}
df_ind <- df_scaled %>% select(scaled_nmr,scaled_u5mr,region, year)
fit <- lm( scaled_nmr ~ ., data = df_ind)
summary(fit)
```

```{r}
resid_panel(fit, plots = "all")
```
